sections.summary:
Highly enthusiastic customer service professional with 7 years of client interface experience. Dedicated Customer Service Representative
motivated to maintain customer satisfaction and contribute to company success. Strong organizational skills, Customer service expert, Active
listening skills, Adaptive team player, Courteous demeanor, also seasoned in conflict resolution with an energetic work attitude.
Highlights
Creative problem solver Excellent communication skills
Types 45 wpm Friendly
Call CenterÂ Approachable
Reliable Exceptional customer service
Accomplishments
Consistently achieved a 100 % teller balancing average, as well as
balanced daily cash drawers and vaults totaling an average of $ 900,000 .
